title: How do I enable or disable the data service?
answer:
Choose either of the following methods: 

 Touch Settings > Mobile networks > Data enabled. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110867)

 Draw down the notification bar. 

 Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110868) or ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110869) to enable or disable the data service.
